00048 void BdkPdfHistPdfHolder::init(const char * theName,
00049                                const char * theDesc,
00050                                RooRealVar * var,
00051                                const char * filename) {  
00052   SetNameTitle(theName, theDesc);
00053 //  nameInit(theName, theDesc);  
00054   setPdfHist(filename, var);

00057 void BdkPdfHistPdfHolder::initHistNames() {
00058   setHistName(BdkEvtTypes::SIG_BAD_D, "DKBadD");
00059   setHistName(BdkEvtTypes::SIG_GOOD_D, "DKGoodD");
00060   setHistName(BdkEvtTypes::DPi_BAD_D, "DPiBadD");
00061   setHistName(BdkEvtTypes::DPi_GOOD_D, "DPiGoodD");
00062   setHistName(BdkEvtTypes::DPiX, "DPiX");
00063   setHistName(BdkEvtTypes::DKX, "DKX");
00064   setHistName(BdkEvtTypes::BB_BAD_D, "BBBadD");
00065   setHistName(BdkEvtTypes::BB_GOOD_D, "BBGoodD");
00066   setHistName(BdkEvtTypes::QQ_BAD_D, "qqBadD");
00067   setHistName(BdkEvtTypes::QQ_GOOD_D, "qqGoodD");       
00068 }

00070 void BdkPdfHistPdfHolder::setPdfHist(const char * filename, RooRealVar * var) {
00071   if (0 == filename || 0 == var) {
00072     return;
00073   }
00074    
00075   // Build PDFs:
00076   
00077   TFile* file = new TFile(filename, "READ");
00078   if(0 == file ) {
00079     cout << " unable to open " << filename << endl;
00080     return;
00081   }
00082   
00083   TH1D * sigBd   = (TH1D*) file->Get(_histNames[BdkEvtTypes::SIG_BAD_D]);
00084   TH1D * sigGd   = (TH1D*) file->Get(_histNames[BdkEvtTypes::SIG_GOOD_D]);
00085   TH1D * DpiBd   = (TH1D*) file->Get(_histNames[BdkEvtTypes::DPi_BAD_D]);
00086   TH1D * DpiGd   = (TH1D*) file->Get(_histNames[BdkEvtTypes::DPi_GOOD_D]);
00087   TH1D * DpiX    = (TH1D*) file->Get(_histNames[BdkEvtTypes::DPiX]);
00088   TH1D * DKX     = (TH1D*) file->Get(_histNames[BdkEvtTypes::DKX]);
00089   TH1D * GBbd    = (TH1D*) file->Get(_histNames[BdkEvtTypes::BB_BAD_D]);
00090   TH1D * GBgd    = (TH1D*) file->Get(_histNames[BdkEvtTypes::BB_GOOD_D]);
00091   TH1D * qqBd    = (TH1D*) file->Get(_histNames[BdkEvtTypes::QQ_BAD_D]);
00092   TH1D * qqGd    = (TH1D*) file->Get(_histNames[BdkEvtTypes::QQ_GOOD_D]);
00093   
00094   RooDataHist * _sigBadD0Hist = 
00095     new RooDataHist("sigBd", "bad sig. ", *var, sigBd);
00096   
00097   _sigBadD0.init(TString(GetName())+".sigBadD0PdfHist", 
00098                  TString(GetTitle())+" sigBadD0PdfHist", *var, *_sigBadD0Hist);
00099   
00100   //
00101   RooDataHist * _sigGoodD0Hist = 
00102     new RooDataHist("sigGd", "good sig. ", *var, sigGd);
